content.raw:
The [gazebo_ros_video](https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/blob/kinetic-devel/gazebo_plugins/src/gazebo_ros_video.cpp) plugin outputs SDF deprecation warnings:


```
Warning [parser.cc:437] Converting a deprecated SDF source[data-string].
```

Using the following XML:

```
  <!-- Screen Display -->
  <gazebo reference="display">
    <visual>
        <plugin name="screen_video_controller" filename="libgazebo_ros_video.so">
          <height>600</height>
          <width>1024</width>
          <topicName>/robot/xdisplay</topicName>
          <robotNamespace>/robot</robotNamespace>
        </plugin>
    </visual>
  </gazebo>
```

I have replicated this bug with Baxter and RRBot. I then tried the non-ROS `` worlds/blink_visual.world`` example created by @chapulina and found the same warnings:

```
Warning [parser.cc:437] Converting a deprecated SDF source[data-string].
Warning [parser.cc:437] Converting a deprecated SDF source[data-string].
Warning [parser.cc:437] Converting a deprecated SDF source[data-string].
Warning [parser.cc:437] Converting a deprecated SDF source[data-string].
Warning [parser.cc:437] Converting a deprecated SDF source[data-string].
Warning [parser.cc:437] Converting a deprecated SDF source[data-string].
```

I notice that his [pull request](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2394/visual-plugin-example-blink/) was merged into Gazebo 7 last July but the example world is not available in my Ubuntu debian install of Gazebo, as reported [here](#!/osrf/gazebo/issues/2103/visualplugins-not-registering-sdf-elements#comment-34454696). Is there a pending update of Gazebo 7 that will fix this? How can I supress this URDF/SDF warning?

Related [PR](https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/pull/546) in gazebo_ros_pkgs
content.html:
The gazebo_ros_video plugin outputs SDF deprecation warnings:

Warning [parser.cc:437] Converting a deprecated SDF source[data-string].

Using the following XML:

  <!-- Screen Display -->
  <gazebo reference="display">
    <visual>
        <plugin name="screen_video_controller" filename="libgazebo_ros_video.so">
          <height>600</height>
          <width>1024</width>
          <topicName>/robot/xdisplay</topicName>
          <robotNamespace>/robot</robotNamespace>
        </plugin>
    </visual>
  </gazebo>

I have replicated this bug with Baxter and RRBot. I then tried the non-ROS worlds/blink_visual.world example created by @chapulina and found the same warnings:

Warning [parser.cc:437] Converting a deprecated SDF source[data-string].
Warning [parser.cc:437] Converting a deprecated SDF source[data-string].
Warning [parser.cc:437] Converting a deprecated SDF source[data-string].
Warning [parser.cc:437] Converting a deprecated SDF source[data-string].
Warning [parser.cc:437] Converting a deprecated SDF source[data-string].
Warning [parser.cc:437] Converting a deprecated SDF source[data-string].

I notice that his pull request was merged into Gazebo 7 last July but the example world is not available in my Ubuntu debian install of Gazebo, as reported here. Is there a pending update of Gazebo 7 that will fix this? How can I supress this URDF/SDF warning?

Related PR in gazebo_ros_pkgs
